title: Tile Set Metadata
description: A resource describing a tileset based on the OGC TileSet Metadata Standard

abstract.description: Brief narrative description of this tile set

version.description: Version of the Tile Set. Changes if the data behind the tiles has been changed

pointOfContact.description: Useful information to contact the authors or custodians for the Tile Set

accessConstraints.description: Restrictions on the availability of the Tile Set that the user needs to be aware of before using or redistributing the Tile Set

mediaType.description: Media types available for the tiles

tileMatrixSetURI.description: Reference to a Tile Matrix Set on the OGC definitions server (http://www.opengis.net/def/tms/). Required if the tile matrix set is registered on the definition server.

tileMatrixSetDefinition.description: Reference to a tile matrix set definition following the 2D Tile Matrix Set Standard. Optional for tile matrix sets defined on the OGC definition server; required for custom Tile Matrix Sets.

boundingBox.description: Minimum bounding rectangle surrounding the tile matrix set, in the supported CRS

links.description: Links to related resources. Possible link 'rel' values are: 'dataset', 'item' or 'alternate'

createdOn.description: When the Tile Set was first produced

publishedOn.description: When the Tile Set was first made available to the users

receivedOn.description: When the Tile Set was received from an external provider

validUntil.description: The future validity of the Tile Set (the Tile Set may no longer be applicable at this date, or that a new revision of the Tile Set is going to be issued)

title.description: Title of this tile matrix set, normally used for display to a human

abstract.description: Brief narrative description of this tile matrix set, normally available for display to a human

keywords.description: Unordered list of one or more commonly used or formalized word(s) or phrase(s) used to describe this layer

dataType.description: Type of data represented in the layer

geometryType.description: The geometry type of the features shown in this layer

pointOfContact.description: Useful information to contact the authors or custodians for the Layer | CharacterString  (e.g. e-mail address, a physical address,  phone numbers, etc)

publisher.description: Organization or individual responsible for making the layer available

theme.description: Category where the layer can be group

minScaleDenominator.description: Minimum scale denominator for usage of the layer

maxScaleDenominator.description: Maximum scale denominator for usage of the layer

maxTileMatrix.description: TileMatrix identifier associated with the minScaleDenominator

minTileMatrix.description: TileMatrix identifier associated with the maxScaleDenominator

boundingBox.description: Minimum bounding rectangle surrounding the layer

date.description: Dates of creation, publication, revision, validity and reception of the layer

style.description: Style used to generate the layer in the tileset

stylableLayerSet.description: Identifiers of styles that can be used in conjunction with this layer

propertiesSchema.description: properties represented by the features in this layer
